meta.source: NCL official site, Cruise Critic, The Points Guy, Eat Sleep Cruise, Freestyle Travelers — 3+ source agreement

venues.name: Taste
venues.description: One of the main dining rooms on Breakaway-era ships with modern decor and a rotating multi-course dinner menu featuring global cuisine.

venues.name: Savor
venues.description: Sister main dining room to Taste with identical rotating menus but a different atmosphere. Complimentary multi-course dinner service.

venues.name: The Manhattan Room
venues.description: The most upscale complimentary main dining room on Breakaway-class ships with live music, elegant ambiance, and rotating nightly menus.

venues.name: Hudson's
venues.description: Prima Class main dining room with 270-degree ocean views, build-your-own pasta, and rotating global menus. Located fully aft on Deck 7.

venues.name: The Commodore Room
venues.description: The second Prima Class main dining room with a maritime-inspired atmosphere, upscale feel, and the same rotating menus as Hudson's.

venues.name: Grand Pacific
venues.description: Main dining room on older and smaller Norwegian ships, offering complimentary multi-course dinner with rotating global menus.

venues.name: Garden Cafe
venues.description: The main buffet restaurant serving breakfast, lunch, and dinner with themed nights and wide international selection. Found on most non-Prima ships.

venues.name: Surfside Cafe
venues.description: Prima Class buffet serving international favorites for breakfast, lunch, dinner, and late-night snacks. Replaces Garden Cafe on newer ships.

venues.name: The Great Outdoors
venues.description: Top-deck outdoor buffet and grill serving burgers, hot dogs, and grilled favorites with ocean views. Come as you are, even in swimwear.

venues.name: Surfside Grill
venues.description: Prima Class pool deck grill with quick bites — burgers, hot dogs, fries, and build-your-own options. Typically open 11:30 AM–5 PM.

venues.name: O'Sheehan's Neighborhood Bar & Grill
venues.description: Casual pub-style dining open 24 hours with comfort food — burgers, wings, fish and chips, and late-night snacks. A fleet favorite.

venues.name: The Local Bar & Grill
venues.description: Prima Class evolution of O'Sheehan's — open 24/7 with casual pub fare like fish and chips, Reuben sandwiches, and burgers.

venues.name: American Diner
venues.description: 1950s-inspired diner with casual comfort food classics — burgers, fries, milkshakes. Made fully complimentary in 2024 (milkshakes extra).

venues.name: Indulge Food Hall
venues.description: Open-concept food hall with multiple distinct cuisine stations (Indian, noodles, BBQ, Latin, rotisserie, tapas, plant-based, desserts). Order via tableside iPads. Hugely popular on Prima Class.

venues.name: The Haven Restaurant
venues.description: Private fine dining exclusively for Haven suite guests, serving breakfast, lunch, and dinner with dedicated menus in a serene atmosphere.

venues.name: Cagney's Steakhouse
venues.description: NCL's signature steakhouse with aged certified Angus beef — rib-eye, filet mignon, porterhouse, NY strip — plus truffle mashed potatoes. Fleetwide. $60 per person.

venues.name: Le Bistro
venues.description: Classic French fine dining with escargot, coq au vin, braised lamb shank, roasted duck breast, and steak tartare. The only NCL restaurant serving Veuve Clicquot. Fleetwide. $60 per person.

venues.name: Teppanyaki
venues.description: Interactive teppanyaki dining with chefs cooking at your table — grilled meats, seafood, and vegetables with entertaining knife skills. $60 per person.

venues.name: Hasuki
venues.description: The upscale Prima Class evolution of Teppanyaki — interactive dining with skilled chefs, high-quality grilled meats, seafood, and vegetables. $60 per person.

venues.name: Ocean Blue
venues.description: High-end seafood restaurant with fresh catches, ocean-inspired dishes, and elegant presentation. $60 per person.

venues.name: Palomar
venues.description: Spectacular seafood-forward Mediterranean restaurant with salted fish, grilled octopus, and natural rope-and-wood decor. Prima Class. $60 per person.

venues.name: Moderno Churrascaria
venues.description: All-you-can-eat Brazilian-style churrascaria with continuous tableside meat service from skewers (rodizio) and a gourmet salad bar. $50 per person.

venues.name: Food Republic
venues.description: Globally inspired small plates with Asian fusion focus — order via tablet, share with the table. Creative flavors from across Asia and beyond. $50 per person.

venues.name: Nama Sushi & Sashimi
venues.description: Fresh handcrafted sushi and sashimi in a dedicated Japanese venue on Prima Class. $50 per person.

venues.name: Sukhothai
venues.description: NCL's first Thai specialty restaurant with salt-and-pepper prawns, curries, Pad Thai, and cashew chicken. Bamboo and rice-paper decor. Prima Plus (Aqua onward). $50 per person.

venues.name: La Cucina
venues.description: Traditional Italian trattoria with classic pastas, chicken parmigiana, and Italian-American comfort food in a warm setting. $40 per person.

venues.name: Onda by Scarpetta
venues.description: Modern, upscale Italian in partnership with Scarpetta restaurant — finessed dishes and bold flavors. More refined than La Cucina. $40 per person.

venues.name: Los Lobos
venues.description: Contemporary Mexican cuisine with a modern twist — elevated tacos, ceviches, and margaritas. $40 per person.

venues.name: Q Texas Smokehouse
venues.description: Texas-style BBQ smokehouse with slow-smoked ribs, brisket, pulled pork, and classic sides. $40 per person.

venues.name: Room Service
venues.description: In-cabin dining available fleet-wide. Breakfast $4.95 per order; lunch/dinner/late-night $9.95 per order plus 20% gratuity. Haven guests receive complimentary 24-hour room service.

venues.name: Coco's
venues.description: Cross between ice cream parlor and candy shop — chocolates, milkshakes, crepes, mini chocolate fountain, and pralines. Open day and night.

venues.name: Dolce Gelato
venues.description: Slow-churned Italian gelato in many flavors, located on the outer deck. A la carte pricing.

venues.name: The Bake Shop
venues.description: Macarons, cupcakes, pastries, cookies, frozen coffees, espressos, and cappuccinos. A la carte pricing.

venues.name: Starbucks
venues.description: Full Starbucks cafe with frappuccinos, lattes, cold brews, teas, and pastries. NCL has the most Starbucks at sea. Not included in drink packages.

venues.name: Sugarcane Mojito Bar
venues.description: Freshly muddled mint and rum mojitos in unique flavors — raspberry guava, jalapeno cucumber, spicy passion fruit. Located on The Waterfront.

venues.name: Shaker's Martini Bar
venues.description: Classic martini bar with an extensive cocktail menu and a stylish, sophisticated atmosphere.

venues.name: Metropolitan Bar
venues.description: Sustainably produced cocktails in a sophisticated setting. Won 2024 Vibe Vista Award. Features grand piano and live music on Aqua. Prima Class.

venues.name: The Cellars — A Michael Mondavi Family Wine Bar
venues.description: Curated wine tastings and varietals in partnership with the Mondavi family. Elevated wine education and tasting experience.

venues.name: The District Brew House
venues.description: 50+ bottled and 20+ draft craft beers plus hand-crafted cocktails. A beer connoisseur's paradise on the Waterfront.

venues.name: Maltings Whiskey Bar
venues.description: Dozens of whiskey varieties — Canadian, Irish, American, Welsh, Scotch — with ocean views on The Waterfront.

venues.name: Syd Norman's Pour House
venues.description: Interactive live rock music venue inspired by legendary Sunset Strip clubs. House band plays rock classics with audience participation.

venues.name: Observation Lounge
venues.description: 180-degree floor-to-ceiling windows with panoramic views and a full-service bar. Light snacks at select times. A serene spot for sunsets.

venues.name: Atrium Bar
venues.description: Located in the heart of the ship's atrium, serving cocktails from morning to late night. The social center of the vessel.

venues.name: Waves Pool Bar
venues.description: Tropical cocktails and cold drinks at the main pool. Swim-up or grab a drink poolside between sun sessions.

venues.name: Spice H2O
venues.description: Adults-only outdoor escape — cocktail oasis by day, dance party under the stars by night. Aft of the ship with ocean views.

venues.name: Vibe Beach Club
venues.description: Private adults-only retreat with cushioned loungers, whirlpools, ocean views, and a full-service bar. Limited passes keep it uncrowded. Separate access fee.

venues.name: Bliss Ultra Lounge
venues.description: Neon-lit nightclub that transforms from family-friendly daytime to adults-only dance venue at night with DJ sets.

venues.name: The Mixx
venues.description: Modern piano bar where live piano entertainment meets cocktails. A social hub for evening entertainment.

venues.name: Ice Bar
venues.description: 17-degree arctic chamber where bars, walls, seats, and glasses are all made of ice. Inspired by Scandinavian ice hotels. Separate admission fee includes two drinks.

venues.name: Soleil Bar
venues.description: Located aft on Ocean Boulevard (Prima Class), serving cocktails and draft beers with sweeping ocean views.
